3.text: Pasindu is a student of Kajulanda M.V. He has always done well in his studies and various extra-curricular activities of the school-especially in sports. Recently, he got through the GCE (A/L) examination with three A passes. So, the school organized a felicitation ceremony for him. The following is the interview that Charith, a member of the school media unit, had with Pasindu just after the ceremony.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='pasindu'>Pasindu</phoneme> is a student of Kajulanda M.V. He has always done well in his studies and various extra-curricular activities of the school-especially in sports. Recently, he got through the GCE (A/L) examination with three A passes. So, the school organized a felicitation ceremony for him. The following is the interview that <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='t͡ʃarit̪'>Charith</phoneme>, a member of the school media unit, had with <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='pasindu'>Pasindu</phoneme> just after the ceremony.</prosody></speak>

4.text: Charith: Good morning, Pasindu! Today is a special day for you. Tell me, What are your thoughts at the moment?
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='t͡ʃarit̪'>Charith</phoneme>: Good morning, <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='pasindu'>Pasindu</phoneme>! Today is a special day for you. Tell me, What are your thoughts at the moment?</prosody></speak>

5.text: Pasindu: I feel really happy and honoured. In fact, this is one of the happiest days of my life.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='pasindu'>Pasindu</phoneme>: I feel really happy and honoured. In fact, this is one of the happiest days of my life.</prosody></speak>

6.text: Charith: You're a role model to all of us. You have been a senior prefect, the captain of the school volleyball team and a school cadet. With all that, you managed to get through your A/L s with flying colours. How did you do all this?
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='t͡ʃarit̪'>Charith</phoneme>: You're a role model to all of us. You have been a senior prefect, the captain of the school volleyball team and a school cadet. With all that, you managed to get through your A/L s with flying colours. How did you do all this?</prosody></speak>
